cause.description:
Stop ignoring the problem that is in your face. Global warming is a problem now that needs to be dealed with. Reduce your CO2 emissions with simple things like turning of your lights or turning the temperature down in your house. Listen to Al Gores 7 point plan and demand changes in the government, because thats what I pledge to do!
1. Reduce CO2 emissions
2. Spread the word about Global Warming
cause.name: Answer the call to stop global warming
